title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing the number 9 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream Numbers can be seen in a dream from mysterious visions, and the dreamer may not know how to search for their interpretation. There are those who see the number nine written in the sky, and those who see this number repeated frequently, and others see that the clock stops at nine, and each of these visions has an interpretation. What is the interpretation of dream number 9? The number nine is the last number in the foundation (i.e. number one). Therefore, the interpretation of the number 9 in a dream is a sign of the end or conveys a message about something essential and important in the dreamer's life. Here are the details of these two points: The first evidence: The number nine can be the fulfillment of hopes and the fulfillment of distant desires that a person has suffered for a long time to achieve and took a long time to reach. In his studies and getting good results. The dream can be evidence of reconciliation between dissenters, the end of disputes and problems between them, whether they are brothers or friends, or a victory over an enemy that threatens the stability of your life. The number 9 in a dream is the number of excellence, success, progress and achieving great achievements in work. Seeing it is a good thing for the reward as a result of the fatigue and effort you are currently making and reaching what you aspire to. The second evidence: But if the dreamer is a social person and meets some new people and does not get to know them well, then seeing this number more than once in a dream may indicate a bad friend who may mislead you and lead you to the unimaginable. You have to be careful with these people. In some interpretations, the number indicates unwanted actions that can hurt people, and this vision can be a warning to the dreamer that he has caused harm to someone, intentionally or unintentionally, and he must search for that person and appease him, or try to restore rights to their owners. The number nine can represent the difficult times and crises that he is currently going through, and this vision portends the imminent end of this difficult period and the return of his life to its usual calm, but he will return more mature and wiser than before. Interpretation of the number 9 in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin considers the number 9 to be the number of perfection and perfection. Because it is ideal in the basic numbers and the cycle of numbers has stopped for a long time, so seeing it is one of the commendable visions that carry good tidings and renewal in the dreamer's life. It also indicates in its interpretations that this number means that problems are about to end, that difficult things are about to become easier and that things are improving. As for the unmarried girl, the number indicates that she is about to get married to the man of her dreams, and is about to achieve the goals and achievements she aspires to, whether in practice or in academic life. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, the Egyptian Google website specializes in interpreting dreams. What is the interpretation of dream number 9 for a single woman? Dream number 9 for individuals Some interpreters tend to consider the number nine as a symbol of an engagement ring. If the girl is not engaged, this vision foretells that a righteous young man will propose to her soon and she will enjoy a quiet and trouble-free life.

title: Interpretation of seeing almonds in a dream: Seeing an almond tree in a dream

preview.html: A dream with almonds for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man. Interpretation of almonds in a dream. Whoever dreams that they give him walnuts or almonds, money will affect him greatly, and Sidr is a great, honest, generous, and fruitful man. Almonds: a strange man. Dream interpretation jurists say that seeing almonds in a dream is a good vision, as It indicates getting rid of diseases and worries in life, and seeing a person eating green almonds in a dream is evidence that he will gain a lot in his life. But if a person sees in his dream that he is eating a bitter almond, this means that he will bear witness to the truth. But if a person dreams that he is peeling an almond and the peel is scattered Above it, it means that it will be covered. And if one sees in his dream that he is eating almonds with their leaves, this indicates that he will receive a lot of money from a person who has status and power. But if one sees that he is picking dry and rotten almonds in a dream, this means that he will go through a situation Of sadness and distress. But if a person dreams that he is cutting down a tree with its almonds, this means that that person is cutting his kinship or that he is preventing goodness from reaching his companions. Interpretation of eating almonds in a dream If a person sees in his dream that he is eating rotten almonds, this means that he is trying to achieve something, but he It will not work. But if one sees in a dream that he is eating almonds out of season, this means that he will get a lot of good things, but after a period of great trouble. Interpretation of a dream about almonds in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation lawyers say that if an unmarried girl sees that she She eats delicious almonds, this means that she will obtain a lot of goodness. But if she sees that she is picking dry almonds that are difficult to open, this indicates that her marriage will be delayed. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying almonds in large quantities and their food tastes delicious, then this is evidence that she You will soon hear good and joyful news that you have been waiting for for a long time, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating almonds and it is not good and spoiled, then this is evidence that there is a hypocritical person in her life and she will reveal this person soon, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of almonds in a dream for a woman Married If a married woman dreams that her husband has given her a quantity of almonds, this means that she will receive a lot of money from her husband. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband buys almonds in large quantities and they taste delicious, this is evidence of how much her husband loves her and that this woman lives in Peace and stability. And her children, and that this lady will soon receive kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of tonsils in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that she eats a lot of almonds without stopping, then this is evidence of natural birth, and that this woman will give birth to a male child with whom she will have a great relationship, and she will give birth to a male, But she and the child will need care and attention after birth, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of tonsils in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is buying almonds from a person who refused to take the price of the almonds from her, this is evidence that she will soon marry a person who fears God and

title: Interpretation of seeing collecting money in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing collecting money in a dream or a dream through a website Roy2a.com, many people save money to do many things such as buying important things or opening a project or even for simple things, so collecting money is one of the important things to meet one’s living needs and the person who does it collects money in a dream and has many indications about the reality of the one who sees it, so we will provide interpretations of seeing these visions for the great scholars of dream interpretation, where Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow. We. Interpretation of seeing collecting money in a dreamA vision of collecting money in exchange for coinsFor the problems and obstacles that the viewer is exposed to and seeks to get rid of. See collecting money for banknotesIndicates the good fortune-teller and fulfillment of obligations and worship. If one sees that he finds money and collects it in a dream, it is a sign of food, kindness and many benefits that will reap its fruits. Seeing the loss of money after collecting it indicates the death of a person by the people of the seer. Seeing collecting money from the dirt that the seer's circumstances will change for the better and he will become rich. Seeing collecting moneyAcademic success and excellence. Seeing collecting money in a dream indicates addition and subtraction, whether in commercial projects or in the viewer's private project. Collecting money in a dream may be an indication of planting the fortune-teller in reality and spending money on useless things. Seeing the collection of money indicates the presence of a girl with a lot of thinking about her future and her constant desire to succeed and achieve her ambitions. Seeing her collecting money shows a girl the dissolution of her union or the failure to achieve the security she seeks. One If the girl sees him wasting money after collecting it, this is a sign of her inability to make the right decisions about her life. See also the explanation: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream Interpretation of seeing money collected in a dream for a married woman Seeing the collection of money for a married woman indicates the state of psychological and material stability in which she lives in her home. Seeing a married woman collecting money from the ground is an indication of new sources of money and livelihood coming to her. If you see a married woman, she collects money from the street, this is an indication of her many social relationships. Collecting money from coins for a married woman is one of the good visions that indicate an abundance of happy events in her home. title: Interpretation of a sister in a dream: I dreamed of my sister in a dream

preview.html: The symbol of a sister for a single woman. For a married woman. For a pregnant woman. For a divorced woman. Seeing a new sister, big or small. For the dreamer to see his sister in a dream, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman, this is something worthy of praise in seeing it, because it portends the coming of happiness and goodness, God willing, especially if seeing the sister in the dream is linked to a beautiful appearance. As for seeing A brother to his sister in a dream, this means a life full of happiness and kindness for the dreamer. A sister in a man’s dream is a symbol of good luck. If a brother sees his sister in a dream, the interpretation of this dream is usually related to the condition of the sister herself, which means that if a brother sees his unmarried sister getting married This foretells that his unmarried sister will get married soon. Or that a happy accident will happen to her. Seeing a brother marrying his sister in a dream is a sign of sustenance and money. If he sees his unmarried sister as if she is pregnant, this means that he is suffering from something, or is affected by it, or is sad or sad. The interpretation of a sister seeing her sister applies to the divination itself and not to the divination itself. Her sister, which means that seeing the sister’s sister getting married and the wise woman was an unmarried girl, and this foretells her marriage, God willing. If the dreamer sees in her dream that her sister is pregnant, this warns her and draws her attention to the presence of difficulties or problems in her life, so if she does not rush to take steps to solve them, then It will cause a lot of problems. Likewise, if the dreamer sees as if her sister gave birth to a male child, while the female child is a symbol of goodness and nourishment in the dreamer’s life. An older sister in a dream is a symbol of happiness and she hears happy, cheerful and joyful news, but these happy news or events will not come true or It occurs only after a year has passed since this vision. While seeing the younger sister heralds joy and glad tidings or a happy event in the near future, God willing. If the dreamer, whether male or female, sees that he is beating his sister in a dream, this means that he will benefit from his sister. Seeing the sister’s illness is a sign that the dreamer is facing some Worries and problems, and the death of a sister is a symbol of travel, emigration, or separation. Interpretation of a dream about a sister: If a brother sees his sister in a dream, this is a sign of good news and happy news. This vision is a sign of happiness and abundant luck. If an unmarried girl sees that her sister is getting married in a dream, this will be reflected in She will be about to get married or engaged. But if the dreamer finds that her sister is marrying her husband, this is evidence that she will have a lot of goodness from her sister, and this will happen in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a sister for an unmarried girl: Seeing an unmarried sister in a dream will be evidence of her marriage, If the sister in the dream is young, this means happy news and many joys, but if the sister appears in the dream in an attractive and generous way and also the same interpretation of seeing the older sister. Interpretation of a dream about a married sisterWhen a married woman sees her sister in a dream, this will be a sign of happiness and goodness that she will enjoy, It is good news and good luck for this married woman. Also, her married life will be happy with her husband, and they will have a lot of money, and the sister in the dream in all circumstances

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream. This vision is considered a praiseworthy dream and also one of the visions that many people receive that brings goodness, abundance, permissibility, and good deeds. There is no need to worry, dear followers, we will provide you with an interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men from the books of major scholars of interpretation and visioning. Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that an iron skewer in a dream is complete, which can indicate the fulfillment of Goals and increased livelihood. If you see a whole iron skewer in a dream, this may indicate self-development and the desire for new things to happen. And the dreamer and good deeds, and God knows best. Also, seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream may indicate the cessation of worries and pains and turning to God Almighty and facilitating the affairs of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream for the common woman. If a girl sees in her dream a bowl in which she sees a complete iron skewer in a dream, this means She will achieve her goals and ambitions that she is trying to achieve. Also, this vision may indicate that she will soon marry a good man who will make her happy in her next life, which is what suits her. Seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream means the wonderful success and reputation that she will achieve in her life, as well as the removal of burdens. And adversity in her next life. Seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream may indicate that she is a social girl who loves to socialize and will establish a new relationship and end up in a good marriage, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams of seeing many iron bars This indicates the collapse of the differences and fears that she suffered from in the previous period, and God knows best. Also, seeing an iron skewer for a married woman indicates the achievement of the desired goals, hopes, and many efforts that you are making, and God knows best. Seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream means that she will soon give birth to a healthy child from all sides. Diseases, but also the happiness that you will live with. Interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream, complete for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream buying complete iron skewers, this vision does not bode well, as it indicates the coming of evil and things that are not intended to be. Also, seeing rods An iron skewer in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her upcoming affairs will be easier, her birth will be easy, and the pain she suffers during childbirth will disappear. The interpretation of seeing an iron skewer in a dream is complete for a man. If a merciful person sees in his dream that he is buying an iron skewer, this indicates that he has committed many sins, And he did not repent for it, and God is the Most High, the Most High. Also, seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream indicates his marriage to a pious, obedient girl who obeys him and her family and does not do anything of disobedience and disobedience. Also, seeing a complete iron skewer in a dream may indicate achieving goals, and doing the right deeds. Entering a new job and making good and abundant money from it. May che

title: Interpretation of a dream about photography in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about shooting in a dream Many people see that seeing shooting in a dream is one of the bad visions, but there are many good interpretations of this vision. In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of shooting in a dream. Follow the article. Interpretation of seeing gunshots in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is shooting someone and killing him, this is evidence that there is a disaster or problem that will occur in the dreamer's life and will cause her many problems in her life. And if she sees that she is shooting someone she knows, this is a sign that she has high morals, and this is a sign that she will maintain these morals for a long time in times of strife. Interpretation of seeing escaping from shooting in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is escaping from shooting, this means that there are many pressures and problems that hinder her life and she will soon get rid of these problems. And if she dreams that she is shooting and she is afraid, this indicates that she will find many consequences due to her escaping from her responsibilities and that she is too lazy to solve her problems on her own. Interpretation of seeing gunshots in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is shooting in a dream, this is evidence that she will soon triumph over her enemies and her enemies will not be able to harm her. But if she sees that someone has shot her and that she is bleeding profusely, this is a sign that she will suffer from abuse Verbal from someone close to her who did not expect to hurt her. And if a married woman sees that she is making a firearm, this is evidence that she will benefit a lot from a man with influence and impact in her community. But if she sees someone shooting her with a machine gun, this is evidence that she is suffering from psychological pressure and exhaustion, because her partner holds her alone to blame. Interpretation of a dream of shooting in the air for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that she is shooting in the air, this indicates that there are many problems that cause her sadness and make her life sad. Seeing a married woman shooting in the air is a sign of her failure to raise her children. Interpretation of seeing gunshots in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is shooting, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy. If a pregnant woman hears gunshots in a dream, this is a sign that her due date is approaching and she needs to prepare well, and this vision can also indicate that she is spending her money on useless things. But if she sees that she is afraid of being shot, this is evidence of the accumulation of debts on her and that she is in dire need of money. And if she sees that she is in a state of war and shoots, this is evidence That she will soon get rid of someone who deceives her and causes her a lot of trouble. And if she sees that someone she does not know is shooting at her, this is evidence that she is very wrong towards people and offends people by what she says, and she must stop what she is doing. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pine tree in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a pine tree in a dream. It is worth noting that seeing trees in general is considered a positive and good vision that has many interpretations and meanings because it varies depending on the type of tree you see in the dream and seeing pine trees in a dream, according to what scholars say. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pine tree in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pine tree in a dream: This vision, as explained by the scholar Ibn Sirin, indicates that it indicates great livelihood and abundance of money, whether it is a woman or a man, and it is not limited to this indication, but rather includes other positive connotations, and in These are the lines that we explain. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a pine tree in a dream is also: It is worth noting that collecting pine trees in a dream. This dream is evidence of obtaining lawful money, which is a lot, as the dreamer can achieve it in the coming period. Likewise, according to what the scholar Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a tree Pine in many dreams. It is evidence of stinginess or bad morals. Also, seeing this tree in a dream in the home. This dream is evidence of the presence of many problems and conflicts in this home, whether in a woman’s dream or a man’s dream. Seeing pine wood in A dream. This is a sign of the money that the dreamer is saving and wood is a sign of the good health that the dreamer enjoys. In addition to seeing pine in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of blessing for children. It is a symbol of this woman making money soon, and God is Most High and knows that. Also, if an unmarried woman sees In a dream, she is sitting among many pine trees. This dream is evidence that this girl has a relationship with a person and will marry him in the near future. title: Interpretation of a dream about crying tears without sound

preview.html: The interpretation of visions varies according to the place and time of the person who sees them. Crying in dreams is not a bad vision as some people think. It can be a harbinger of the end of anxiety and worry from the life of the seer. Interpretation of seeing crying without a voice in a dream of a single girl When an unmarried woman dreams that the dead is crying without a voice, this indicates kindness and food for her. If she sees a dead person who is still alive, and screams loudly. This explains the problems and crises she is going through now. Crying with tears and without a voice in a dream is evidence of the good news that the girl is waiting for. See also: Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of seeing tears without a voice in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that she is crying loudly in a dream and she is very sad. This is evidence of the debts and suffering she is going through. Crying without tears in a dream is a sign of delayed pregnancy and sadness, because you think about it a lot. If he sees that the dead mother is crying with tears in a dream, this indicates a change in the situation, for the better with the husband, God willing. Interpretation of seeing tears with tears without a voice in a dream about a man and its meaning Seeing a man crying mixed with tears in a dream is evidence that he feels remorse for something he did. Crying loudly in a married man's dream is evidence of the debts that Bear it. Sadness and silent crying over a dead person, indicates the end of worry and sadness from the dreamer's life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams with crying with tears The meaning of seeing crying without a voice in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation To dream of a pregnant woman crying with tears and without a voice means an easy and easy birth. Crying over a person who has been dead for a long time without a voice in a pregnant woman's dream. It indicates fear of the approaching date of birth, but it will be good and safe. If you dream that a pregnant woman is crying with tears and without a voice, this indicates a birth without fatigue or difficulties. Interpretation of seeing tears crying without a voice in a dream for young people and its meaning If a young man sees in a dream that he is crying for a friend who died a long time ago, this means that he will soon hear happy news. If you see someone crying without a voice or tears in a dream, this means that the situation will change for the better in the coming period. If a young man sees in a dream that a woman is crying quietly and without tears, this indicates an engagement or the approaching date of marriage. Interpretation of seeing crying without a voice and tears for a divorced woman Interpretation of seeing the dead crying over the dead in a divorced woman's dream without a voice, means that God will return soon. Seeing a divorced woman crying loudly and with tears indicates To the end of worry and sadness from her life. If he saw the mother crying, sad and silent, and gave her something in a dream. Evidence that she married a man, compensated for the difficult days she spent. You may also be interested in: Crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing silent cries for an old woman Seeing an old woman crying over her dead husband in a dream indicates great sadness due to separation. If he sees a sick person crying in a dream, this is a sign of recovery from illness and recovery soon. If the old woman sees that her husband dies in a dream, this indicates the longevity of the husband and

title: Interpretation of dreams about toothpicks: Seeing a toothpick in a dream

preview.html: The siwak in an unmarried woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning teeth for a woman. The gift of brushing teeth in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth for a girl. Seeing a toothpick in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Giving a toothpick in a dream. Interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a toothpick or a toothpick in a dream indicates a good spirit and nature. The pure, well-being and soundness brought by the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. Ibn Sirin said that using a toothpick or toothpick in a dream indicates good relationships with family, loved ones, and relatives, their connection, and the dreamer’s constant inspection of their conditions and his kindness to them. It is the act of worship through which this person draws closer to God Almighty and spends suspicious money that is forbidden by Sharia law. Interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: If a person sees in his dream that he is using a toothpick and embracing, then his vision indicates that this person takes into account the Sunnah of the Prophet and its application, and that he desires to perform the obligation. And the Sunnah mentioned by the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. He, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: Seeing someone using a toothpick in his sleep is evidence of his righteousness and good self. In some of the sayings of Imam al-Nabulsi, it is also included that seeing a toothpick indicates the ambiguity of the dreamer to avoid falling into destructive talk and speech, such as crying, insults, and the like, and the person who sees it. Dreaming of using a toothpick or a toothpick and seeing that blood came out of his teeth, then his vision shows this person’s repentance from some of the sins and transgressions that he committed in his real life and that this blood is his sins for which God Almighty forgave him of his own will. Likewise, the infidel sees in his dream that he is being sued, so his vision indicates that he He will convert to Islam soon, God willing, but if an unmarried person or girl sees himself using a toothpick in a dream, then the vision indicates marriage and a close marriage, God willing. Interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream Seeing a toothbrush in a dream indicates a person’s good treatment of everyone around him and indicates However, he spends on it kindly. In general, in a dream, it can mean that you are getting closer to God, purity, and the useful, good, and right deeds that a person performs in his life. The presence of the siwak in a dream is evidence of the closeness of God Almighty, and a sign of the dreamer’s purity and doing good and beneficial deeds in life, and that the person Whoever sees the siwak and uses it in a dream can be freed from problems. He committed something in his life. Interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who uses a toothpick in a dream to clean her teeth is distinguished by good morals and a good personality in society, and God loves her. In the event that an unmarried girl sees herself using a toothbrush and receives it as a gift from anyone, it could be This is a sign of the arrival of good news and happy news in her academic and professional life. Seeing a toothpick in a dream for an unmarried girl is praiseworthy, because it shows good skin from God and he gives her this vision so that her heart is reassured and she can live a decent life without it.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about dough with one hand by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about dough in hand for single women: Among the mysterious dreams of a girl that carry with them different interpretations, some of which are praiseworthy and others not. Interpretation of dreams about dough in hand for single women. What is the interpretation of a dream about dough in hand for a free woman? If a girl sees white dough in her hand, this It indicates her good qualities, and her heart is tender and gentle. A girl seeing dough that is tight is a sure sign that she will achieve the dreams and aspirations that she has been striving for throughout her life, and this vision may indicate that she will soon gain a lot for a living. If an unmarried girl sees dough in The oven, this is evidence of the approaching date of her wedding with whomever she wants. If she made dough from barley, fenugreek, or wheat flour and it was fermented and she only had a little time left before she went into the oven to finish anything else, then this is good for her to get what she wants. For everything that he aspires to in the very near future. The presence of dough in the home for an unmarried girl indicates the many profits that she will make from the businesses that she can engage in trade. When you see her kneading barley dough in her sleep, this is evidence of her good conditions in worship and her patience with all the events that She is exposed to it, which may disturb her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about dough with a single hand by Ibn Sirin? The respected scholar Ibn Sirin says: If a girl sees dough being prepared to flatten her, this is a sign that her marriage is approaching, and that all her many wishes will be fulfilled. If she sees that she has a firm dough in her hand, This is evidence that she will succeed in her academic life, and will obtain high grades in her future work. Yeast for single people is evidence of her readiness and desire to enter into a relationship and shoulder her responsibilities, but if she sees that she is eating the dough quickly before it is cooked, this is evidence that she has made many wrong decisions. That prompted her to do so. He loses a lot. If a single woman sees that someone is giving her a pie in her hand, this is clear evidence that someone is trying to deceive her. Seeing puff pastry in the hand of an unmarried woman is a sign of her bright success in the future, while if you see her eating bran from flour, this It means that she is in dire need of money. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. The most important interpretations of a dream about dough in the hands of single women. Interpretation of dreams about kneading dough by hand for unmarried women. Ibn Sirin says that seeing dough fermenting in a dream is evidence that you will hear happy and cheerful news The vision indicates the prolongation of an individual’s life, and may indicate great desires and their fulfillment in the future. If an unmarried woman sees that she is kneading dough and its color is pure white to the point that she eats it before baking it, this is evidence of the purity of her heart and good morals and that people appreciate and love her very much. A lot about her modesty. The vision indicates that the girl has strong determination and completes the work she is doing or that she will be cured of her illness if she is sick.
